Author: Sushisnac
Text: Hey, im the same. Im someone who looks to external sources of validation and compared myself to others by seeing what theyre doing constantly. Ngl sometimes I stalk girls im envious of on insta and im hoping one day im so thin someone is stalking me. I think as long as youre not acting on it and hurting people then its just part of the mental illness we have, you know, and youre not a bad person for thinking it.
